reviews.title: Great but one bug....
reviews.comment: Love the fact that this app does what it can very nicely. Only one bug though, the clear and refresh buttons don\'t work and I have to return and choose what I have to convert again before entering new values. 5 stars if fixed. Thanks.
reviews.author: Adejumat Ahmed

reviews.title: Love the app
reviews.comment: Hi dev, can the icon be changed? It looks too old. Excellent app btw
reviews.author: Varun Chitale

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Nice little app, nice UI and does what the name says perfectly.
reviews.author: Kristjan origin

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: good Design i like it , but when i chose Currency the head title display (heat) not currency hope you solve this problem soon . overall i like this program ..... thanks .
